resources.string: A convenience application designed for any student or visitor at University of Michigan - Ann Arbor who is interested in navigating and learning about our beautiful campus more efficiently.
This is a personal project and was not developed on University of Michigan's behalf.
To report any errors/misinformation or ask any questions, feel free to email me at jjian@umich.edu.
Campus Explorer accelerates the process of finding the information you need with its custom search features.
The home menu offers a list of seven building categories to choose from, including the option to see all buildings on campus!
The radio buttons at the bottom of each list allow you to filter the displayed buildings by their locations.
Alternatively, you can utilize the custom search-view if you have a specific building name in mind.
Selecting a building name exhibits helpful information about the building, including an interactive web-view of its website.
Tap on the star next to the building name to save the building to your Favorites list, which you can easily access in the home menu.
Tap on the Directions button to launch Google Maps with a uniquely encoded url. No need to type in your starting point or destination!
